articles.author: Madeline Holcombe, CNN
articles.title: For Asians and Asian Americans facing increased incidents of hate in the wake of the pandemic, the Atlanta-area attacks only exacerbate existing fears
articles.description: Through hushed tones, a woman called 911 from an Atlanta spa Tuesday to say that she believed a man with a gun was going to rob them.
articles.content:
